result.execSummary:
The defendant Brandon Kyle Negrete Rios was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Brandon Kyle Negrete Rios is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Brandon Kyle Negrete Rios was found guilty of Operate with Restricted Controlled Substance (2nd) [Modifiers: Penalty - Operating While under the Influence (2nd Offense)], an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 346.63(1)(am).
  • Brandon Kyle Negrete Rios was found guilty of Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Submit DNA sample.  $65 blood draw reimbursement fee.
Huber privileges subject to jail policies. May transfer to Dane County.
Complete an AODA assessment and follow through with any treatment recommendations. Counts 3 and 4 dismissed.

records.addlTxt: 9:07 AM Prosecuting attorney Brenda L. Yaskal in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Brandon Kyle Negrete Rios in court.  Attorney John Paul Holevoet in court for Brandon Kyle Negrete Rios. Agreement recited by State. Court reviewed the rights & elements. Defendant pled no contest to counts 1 & 2. Court found defendant guilty, entered judgment. Counts 3 & 4 dismissed. Sentencing statements. Court sentenced the defendant on count 1 to serve 10 days in jail, with Huber. $1442.00 fines and costs. $65.00 blood draw fee. Submit DNA sample. 13 mo. DL revocation and 12 mo. IID. Complete an AODA assessment and follow through with any treatment recommendations. Count 2 $243.00 costs. Sixty days to pay fine or set up a payment plan with Clerk of Courts. Jail start 7/22/22 at 7:00 PM. May transfer to Dane County Jail. Court holds no position on EMP. 1 day credit. 9:19 AM
for a return date 6/22/22 at 9:00 A.M.
